name: Angry Old Ben
description:
A game by Vittal, Arnav, and Gurpreet.

Uncle Ben’s rage is a competitive endless beat-em up game, where the main objective of the game is to survive as far as the player can so as to gain higher score. During the gameplay, the player will encounter enemies in numbers, which they have to beat in order to increase their points.


Controls:

Keyboard:

>WASD: Movement

>Spacebar: pickup/throw

PS Controller:

>Left Stick: Movement

>X: pickup/throw

XBOX Controller:

>Left Stick: Movement

>A: pickup/throw
